relation.text: This day did not turn out

seems active , his countenance is sensible & he would have been handsome , but for his under Lip which is thick & has in no play in its muscles -- he was very civil to us -- the dinner and Wines were suitable to his fortune which is 16000 £ a year
a few months amongst her own & some of our agreeable freinds -- I find
was exceſsively laughed at a few days ago
this day again is cloudy & will rain
will become of us in a few years
